verified.description: If ALL 4 elements of the PI were matched, always use 'true'. Else, provide 'false' with optional 'verifiedInfo'.

verifiedInfo.description: Optional. Only used if 'verified' is 'false' to represent which PI element(s) did not match  Instead of showing empty string or null, do NOT include unless there’s value. Values: 001 – no matching sGTIN, 002 – no matching LOT, 003 – no matching Exp Date, 004 – no matching LOT & Exp date

additionalInfo.description: Optional. Will be used if response is 'true' to provide additional information of the state of the sGTIN, like shipped, recalled, in-stock, decommissioned etc. These codes can be ranged from 001 to 099 with various statuses.  Instead of showing empty string or null, do NOT include unless there’s value. Values: 001 – do not re-sell; recalled, 002 – placeholder for future use, 003 – placeholder for future use

errorMessage.description: Optional if needed (e.g. not the Responder for PI).  Instead of showing empty string or null, do NOT include unless there’s value.
